import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import './ViewCustomers.css' import { db } from '../firebase' import {Delete } from '@material-ui/icons'; export default function ViewCustomers({deleteUsers, customers}) { useEffect( () => { }, []) deleteUsers = () => { console.log("Users Deleted") } const handleDelete = async e => { let deleteID = e.target.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.id; console.log(deleteUsers(), deleteID) if (window.confirm('Are you sure to delete this record?')) { db.child(`user/${deleteID}`).remove( err => { if (err) console.log(err) else console.log("success") }) } } return ( <>

Cafe Kora Customers

Total Customers: {customers?.length}

{ customers?.length ? <>
{ customers.map( customer => ) }
First Name Last Name Email Address Phone Number Date Joined
{customer.fname} {customer.lname} {customer.email} {customer.phone} {customer.datejoined.toDate().toDateString()}
:

Loading Customers...

} ) }
